if (WIN32 AND NOT DESKTOP_APP_USE_PACKAGED)

    target_link_libraries(external_auto_updates
    INTERFACE
        desktop-app::external_lzma
    )

    target_link_libraries(external_auto_updates
    INTERFACE
        desktop-app::external_xz
    )
